alert.note: Alert for Greene (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 27 at 1:32PM EST until November 27 at 1:45PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EST FOR EASTERN MONROE...SOUTHEASTERN BELMONT...WEST CENTRAL GREENE... OHIO...NORTHWESTERN WETZEL AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 132 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of New Martinsville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Wheeling, Moundsville, New Martinsville, Bellaire, Shadyside, McMechen, Powhatan Point, Glen Dale, Bridgeport, Benwood, Brookside, and Clarington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
